metadata.synopsis: Two nobles in Jannath Estate argue and finally come to blows. This oneliner is for if AngryNoble_001 is the survivor or if both nobles were calmed down. This noble sold the fake painting.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1) Players get close to arguing nobles in the dining room CTY_Main_A -248; 25; -512)Interact with any of the nobles, then follow them outside3) Interact with a noble during the AD4) End second dialog and have them fight or leave5) Talk to Noble 1

0.speaker: Lord Delwaer Jeth
0.text: I suppose I shall have to tell Gorran's husband. He'll be devastated.
0.context: NodeContext: Bitter, hint of sadness - didn't mean for it to come to this

1.speaker: Lord Delwaer Jeth
1.text: That's the last time I try to do a friend a favour. The ingratitude...

2.speaker: Lord Delwaer Jeth
2.text: Gorran should have left it alone. He never did know when to accept defeat.
2.context: NodeContext: Bitter, hint of sadness - didn't mean for it to come to this

3.speaker: Lord Delwaer Jeth
3.text: I'm hardly to blame if some people have more money than sense. Or in Gorran's case, a deficit of both.
